pr_title: Only add json content-type when necessary

timeline.message:
Only add json content-type when necessary

Fixes: #14045
Take suffix of media type into account when Response is used

timeline.bodyText: Pretty sure that's not how media type mapping works, as it will even match application/stef-hates-json which is not JSON at all ;)
timeline.author: FroMage

replies.bodyText: Fair point. When someone comes to us with such an example, you can tell me: I told you so :)
replies.author: geoand

replies.bodyText: Sure, but just remember that media type matching doesn't work like this, we don't want to oversimplify stuff everywhere ;)
replies.author: FroMage

replies.bodyText:
Definitely.
Made a mental note, so when this comes up, I'll know where to look :)
replies.author: geoand
